name: Cannot update the integer field of the param of "iteration_length" of project with different values -- @1.1

steps.name: Given I set up a "PUT" request to "/projects/{proj_id}" endpoint
And I set up the data
Then I get a "400" status code as response
And I verify the general_problem of error is: "iteration_length can only be between 1 and 4."

parameters.name: message
parameters.value: iteration_length can only be between 1 and 4.

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Functional Test Negative Cases of Update Projects
